summary: This changes the looks of the Jessica Alba follower.
descriptionHtml:
[color=lightgreen]You can find her at The Winking Skeever in Solitude.[/color]

[b]Based upon[/b]
"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27955]Lovely Jessica - Standalone -[/url]" by "[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5568493]Omega99jp[/url]"

[i][b]*Screenshots are taken with UNPB body with swirly tattoo and the optional 0 weight ESP.[/b][/i]

[color=red]!! Can't be used alongside the Original.[/color]


[heading][color=yellow]Upgrading from original Jessica[/color][/heading]
[color=lightblue][i]This will probably not affect most of you.[/i][/color]
[color=red]!! Careful when you've already met the original Jessica as her body tint might not change to the dark color.[/color]
I'm not really sure on how to fix this but you could try this.
1- Open console
2- Click on Jessica (recommend you do this in first person)
3- Type "snpcw 100" and she will increase in weight. Her head could also change to some default breton one but you can ignore that
4- Save game and restart Skyrim then load that save
5- Body color should be correct now (I think)
6- Do step 1 and 2 again then continue from here.
Depending on what ESP you use you should type this:
For the Main ESP type this "snpcw 60"
For the Optional Spellsword ESP type this "snpcw 0"
7- Save game and restart Skyrim then load that save


[heading][color=yellow]Changes from Original[/color][/heading]
Hair: White
Eyes: Grey/Blind
Skin: Dark Chocolate


[heading][color=yellow]File Options and what they include[/color][/heading]
[b][u]Main Files[/b][/u]
[b]Main file for UNP - Underwear[/b]
Includes Head/Face and Skincolor and UNP Body with Underwear.

[b]Use this for CBBE[/b]
Main file - Includes Head/Face and Skincolor - Requires [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27955]Lovely Jessica - Standalone -[/url]

[b][u]Optional Files[/b][/u] *These require the correct main file
[b]Spellsword ESP-No Spells Learned-Weight0[/b]
Optional file - Includes Modified ESP that changes combat style to Spellsword (does not include pre-learned spells) and sets her weight to 0.
It would be smart to use some sort of mod that lets you add spells to followers like [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url]

[b]UNP Body Nude with Tattoo[/b]
Includes nude UNP Body and UNP Body texture with swirly paint. - Requires Main file for UNP - Underwear

[b]UNP Skinny Body Nude with Tattoo[/b]
Includes nude UNP Skinny Body and UNP Body texture with swirly paint. - Requires Main file for UNP - Underwear

[b]UNPB Body Nude with Tattoo[/b]
Includes nude UNPB Body and UNP Body texture with swirly paint. - Requires Main file for UNP - Underwear


[heading][color=yellow]Installation[/color][/heading]
[b][u]For Main Files[/u][/b]
Either use NMM to download and install or copy the contents of the 7zip into your Skyrim/Data folder.

[b][u]For Optional Files[/u][/b]
If you want you can then pick any of the optional files to add to it but be sure you pick a body mod that fits your selected main file (See "File Options and what they include" above for more info).
If you install any optional file with NMM click No when asked if it's a patch/upgrade and then yes when asked to overwrite.


[heading][color=yellow]Uninstall[/color][/heading]
Deactive the mod with NMM or delete the files.


[heading][color=yellow]Incompatibility[/color][/heading]
None currently known


[heading][color=yellow]Known Bugs[/color][/heading]
None currently known


[heading][color=yellow]Credits[/color][/heading]
Thanks to Omega99jp for the amazing work on the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27955/]Jessica Alba follower[/url]
Thanks to calyps for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899]UNPB Body[/url]
Thanks to dimon99 for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP Body[/url]
Thanks to Caliente for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE Body[/url]
And ofcourse thanks to Bethesda for creating the game and Creation Kit.


[heading][color=yellow]Tools Used[/color][/heading]
Creation Kit - To edit her combat style and weight.
NifSkope - To edit the UV-Map of the eyes.
Paint.NET - To edit the textures.


[heading][color=yellow]Licensing/Legal[/color][/heading]
You can use the file however you like just remember to give credits where due and don't forget the to check the permissions of the Credited Authors/Files.
author: ErikRedbeard
